select ot.no, DATE_FORMAT(ot.date, "%Y-%m-%d") as date, ot.total_price as totalPrice , ot.payment_option as paymentOption, ot.state, p.name as productName , count(p.name) as count, u.name as userName from order_table ot, order_product op, product p, user u where ot.no = op.order_no and op.product_no = p.no and ot.user_no = u.no
and ot.no like '%${opt.keyword}%'
and u.name like '%${opt.keyword}%'
and p.name like '%${opt.keyword}%'
and ot.state = '주문신청'
and ot.state = '주문확인'
and ot.state = '입금확인'
and ot.state = '배달중'
and ot.state = '배달완료'
and ot.state = '주문취소'
and ot.date between '${opt.day1}' and '${opt.day2}'
group by ot.no limit #{startCount},#{countList}
